Question: How smart was Stephen Hawking? Firstly, what is your measure of “smart”? If your answer is IQ, then that doesn’t help answer the question as professor Hawking never took an IQ test and actually regarded the concept of an IQ test stupid. The best we can do in terms of guessing how “smart” Stephen Hawking is, is to look at his achievements. Hawking’s work related mainly to extending Einstein’s theories to cosmological phenomena, specifically, black holes. The idea that black holes radiate their energy away over time seems intuitive to most people with knowledge in physics, but only after Hawking showed that it is the case. Developing a new theory that seems intuitive once someone understands it, is truly a mark of genius. Without a doubt, Hawking was significantly smarter than the average person (but probably not Newton smart).
